rooms.name: Open-Plan Kitchen and Living Area
rooms.description: A spacious open-plan kitchen adjoining the living area, integrating Bohemian design elements like colorful tiles, exposed brick finishes, reclaimed wood accents, and vintage furniture.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A luxurious master bedroom with a private balcony, king-sized bed, and Bohemian interior accents including colorful throws and decorative lamps.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A generously sized bedroom with Bohemian style, featuring wall murals and soft lighting for a relaxing ambiance.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: A comfortable bedroom with a Bohemian touch, incorporating eclectic art pieces and vibrant textiles.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: A well-appointed bedroom that balances modern comfort with Bohemian aesthetics, featuring a mix of vintage and contemporary furnishings.

rooms.name: Bedroom 5
rooms.description: A cozy bedroom designed with Bohemian influences using patterned rugs, eclectic furniture, and warm lighting to create a serene environment.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A versatile guest bedroom with Bohemian decor that can also serve as an office or study, featuring comfortable seating and ample storage.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: An exclusive home theater with immersive sound systems, ambient lighting, and comfortable seating arranged in a semi-circular layout. Bohemian touches are added via artistic wall murals and eclectic decor.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A dedicated dining area that seamlessly connects with the kitchen, featuring Bohemian patterns and decorative lighting.

rooms.name: Study/OFFICE
rooms.description: A functional study area or office space integrated into the living area, designed for productivity with Bohemian aesthetic touches.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: A compact utility room housing laundry and storage facilities, designed with a Bohemian flair using reclaimed materials.

rooms.name: Balcony / Veranda
rooms.description: An expansive balcony overlooking the garden, offering space for relaxation and social gatherings with Bohemian furniture and decor.

openings.description: A grand entrance on the corner plot with a covered porch and decorative arches, aligning with Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
A secondary entrance providing access to the garden area and outdoor kitchen space.
Large windows ensuring ample natural light throughout the living spaces, with Bohemian stained glass accents where appropriate.
